channel.title: OldSchoolPking - Flawless Switching - Kill Streak - Bounty Hunter - Pk Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U6JHTu8.png[/img]
[img]http://oi50.tinypic.com/24br8ro.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[I][SIZE="3"]Welcome to the OldSchoolPking Advertisement Thread. First off we will begin by informing you what you are expecting.
You will be playing a 317 spawn server with a pk points economy. There is dicing and a vote point shop full of rares.
You start off with customizing your character. You later have the option to Choose between the Maxed Level & Hybrid/Melee Package.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/o1sOgPr.png[/img]
and a Pure Starter Package
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4u9fUua.png[/img]
Most of your player info is on the quest tab so you can always check it.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/V54uIDe.png[/img]
You can always customize your client by going to the Wrench on the bottom of the screen. There will be another Wrench square, click it. This will appear.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ppL7ySF.png[/img]
After you gear up for pking you'll find 3 altars. -Ancients -Lunars -Refill Prayer
You can later proceed by going to the mage book and teleport to the pking spot of your choice.
After getting Pk Points you can buy things from the pk point shop.
[img]http://puu.sh/NAyE[/img]
We have made pking more enjoyable by adding our own unique Bounty Hunter system. A player with a killstreak of 3 or more will be announced globally. The Player that kills him gets the same amount of Pk Points as his streak.
The combat has been tweaked and almost perfected for your enjoyment.
Here is some media. Remember this media was in the BETA version and most things are fixed.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ry5aB4g.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/GdW0014.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SyxlmnZ.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KAmOqqK.png[/img]
We have daily pk events. It can be a hybrid tournament or a server multi war. You guys name it and staff hosts it!
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PcgA5JNBnHE&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
We have 2 Forums for you to choose from.
1. [url=http://jayy.forumotion.com/]KingPkz - Portal[/url] 2. [url=http://www.kingpkz.smffy.com/index.php?wwwRedirect]KingPkz[/url]
All info to download or webclient will be on the forums.
Credits:
+ Orel
[/CENTER][/SIZE][/I]

Does it have 63 wave jad?

It’s a spawn server. You can spawn the Fire Cape.

item.title: OldSchoolPking - Flawless Switching - Kill Streak - Bounty Hunter - Pk Server
item.dc:creator: @MasterPkz317 MasterPkz317
item.description:
@MasterPkz317 wrote:

[CENTER][CENTER]

[/CENTER]

[I][SIZE=“3”]Welcome to the OldSchoolPking Advertisement Thread. First off we will begin by informing you what you are expecting.

You will be playing a 317 spawn server with a pk points economy. There is dicing and a vote point shop full of rares.

You start off with customizing your character. You later have the option to Choose between the Maxed Level & Hybrid/Melee Package.

o1sOgPr.png765×468

and a Pure Starter Package

4u9fUua.png763×473

Most of your player info is on the quest tab so you can always check it.

You can always customize your client by going to the Wrench on the bottom of the screen. There will be another Wrench square, click it. This will appear.

After you gear up for pking you’ll find 3 altars.
-Ancients
-Lunars
-Refill Prayer

You can later proceed by going to the mage book and teleport to the pking spot of your choice.

After getting Pk Points you can buy things from the pk point shop.

We have made pking more enjoyable by adding our own unique Bounty Hunter system. A player with a killstreak of 3 or more will be announced globally. The Player that kills him gets the same amount of Pk Points as his streak.

The combat has been tweaked and almost perfected for your enjoyment.

Here is some media.
Remember this media was in the BETA version and most things are fixed.

We have daily pk events. It can be a hybrid tournament or a server multi war. You guys name it and staff hosts it!

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PcgA5JNBnHE&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

We have 2 Forums for you to choose from.

  1. KingPkz - Portal
  2. KingPkz

All info to download or webclient will be on the forums.

Credits:

  • Orel

[/CENTER][/SIZE][/I]
